hooks.command: sketchybar --trigger ai_agent_waiting SESSION_ID=$(tmux display-message -p '#{session_id}') WINDOW_ID=$(tmux display-message -p '#{window_id}')
sketchybar --trigger ai_agent_done SESSION_ID=$(tmux display-message -p '#{session_id}') WINDOW_ID=$(tmux display-message -p '#{window_id}')
sketchybar --trigger ai_agent_done SESSION_ID=$(tmux display-message -p '#{session_id}') WINDOW_ID=$(tmux display-message -p '#{window_id}')
